comment: Galaxy Fold problem me and my husband have a galaxy. Fold4, and both of them are having problems with TikTok. The screen will load half of the screen and the other side be black. Also, the comments are always off , With this new update, please fix this now. I know our phones are new so it has nothing to do it .
key sentence: The screen will load half of the screen and the other side be black on the Galaxy Fold4.
